CustomField.description: The commentary is guided by the outcome of the E&S screening tool: - If a 'low' rating is obtained for both the CRA and TRA, no E&S commentary is required - If a 'medium' rating is obtained for either CRA or TRA, the transactor should explain why there is a 'medium' rating, as well as note that the regional E&S coordinator will be involved in the credit process - If a 'high' rating is obtained for either CRA or TRA, the transactor should contact the central E&S team to advise on commentary to include
CustomField.inlineHelpText: - Low rating = No E&S commentary is required - Medium rating = Transactor to explain the issues and note the E&S DD to be done - High Rating = Transactor to contact the central E&S team to advise on commentary to include
CustomField.label: E & S Risk Commentary
